m_szDocTitle: Renewable Energy for Desalination is Focus of New Masdar Demonstration Facility
m_szDocSumamry: January 19th, 2013 by Tina Casey   Er…probably not. However, just a few years ago the idea of transferring ultra-massive quantities of seawater out of the ocean and putting it to use on land was a lot less realistic than it is today, mainly because of the massive amount of energy required to pump, desalinate and transport it. What has changed is the availability of low cost, low impact renewable energy technologies, as demonstrated by a new renewable energy desalination project in Masdar, Abu Dhabi.
